title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 302 - Submission And Payment Of Bills
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 302 - Submission And Payment Of Bills

State Regulations
§ 302.1 - Submission of bills to social services districts for services and supplies furnished to recipients of public assistance and payment thereof
§ 302.2 - Submission of bills to social services districts for services and supplies furnished to them and payment thereof

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 302

Statutory authority: Constitution, art. XVII, § 2; Social

Services Law, §§17, 20, 34, 138, 141, 153, 363-a, 409; L. 1971, ch. 110, §
83

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
